name: TweenIntoView
shortDescription: Tween objects into position from off screen.
description: Tween objects into position from off screen, or from a set distance, to create a polished visual effect.
When objects are created, or if they exist at the beginning of the scene, they are put ouside of screen and tweened back to their initial position.
This extension can be used to:

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Tween objects into position from off screen.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: TweenIntoView

events.comment:
doStepPostEvents is used to avoid a 1-frame delay:
- The objects are created (by events or at the scene creation)
- doStepPostEvents trigger tweens
- The frame is displayed
- The tween behavior start moving the objects
We do it here because the object position is not yet known from onCreated.

eventsFunctions.description: Return the X position at the beginning of the fade-in.
eventsFunctions.name: OriginX

eventsFunctions.description: Return the Y position at the beginning of the fade-in.
eventsFunctions.name: OriginY

eventsFunctions.description: Tween the object to its set starting position.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenIn

events.comment: We evaluate the origin every time because the window may have been resized.

eventsFunctions.description: Tween the object to its off screen position.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenOut

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object finished tweening into view.
eventsFunctions.name: IsTweenedIn

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object finished tweened out of view.
eventsFunctions.name: IsTweenedOut

eventsFunctions.description: Set whether to delete the object when the "tween out of view" action has finished.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShouldBeDeleted
eventsFunctions.sentence: Should delete _PARAM0_ when the "tween out of view" action has finished: _PARAM2_

parameters.description: Should delete the object when the "tween out of view" action has finished
parameters.name: Value

propertyDescriptors.label: Distance
propertyDescriptors.description: Leave this value at 0 to move the object in from outside of the screen.
propertyDescriptors.name: Distance

propertyDescriptors.label: Tween in the object at creation
propertyDescriptors.name: ShouldPlayAtCreation

propertyDescriptors.label: Delete the object when the "tween out of view" action has finished
propertyDescriptors.name: ShouldBeDeleted

propertyDescriptors.label: The X position at the end of fade in
propertyDescriptors.name: TargetX

propertyDescriptors.label: The Y position at the end of fade in
propertyDescriptors.name: TargetY

propertyDescriptors.label: The X position at the beginning of fade in
propertyDescriptors.name: OriginX

propertyDescriptors.label: The Y position at the beginning of fade in
propertyDescriptors.name: OriginY
